description: This script initializes MongoDB collections and indexes for a LudoMaster game backend, setting up the database schema without inserting data. It creates multiple collections such as users, rooms, games, chat_messages, player_stats, leaderboards, and system_events, defining indexes for efficient queries.

methods.name: requireEnv
methods.description: Checks for the existence of a required environment variable and returns its value, throws an error if missing.

methods.name: ensureCollection
methods.description: Ensures a collection exists in the database; creates it if it does not, and optionally defines collection options.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main async function that sets up the database connection, creates collections, and sets up indexes for the game schema.
